sentence.Network_en: What is right for us need not be right for others.
sentence.Network_cn: 对我们来说是对的东西，对别人来说未必正确。

sentence.Network_en: I imagined the eyes of the others in the room upon me.
sentence.Network_cn: 我觉得屋里其他人似乎都在盯着我。

sentence.Network_en: Henry generally stayed ahead of the others in the academic subjects.
sentence.Network_cn: 亨利的文化课成绩通常都优于其他学生。

encyclopedia.content: others 是复数代词，泛指其他的人或物 others 1. 其他加工用材料 光电词汇港台地区译法(O) others 其他加工用材料 2. 其它 美容院相关术语 其它（others） Others 1. 其它方面 英语标识语和提示语（一）—生命经纬 Others 其它方面 some...others 相当于汉语“有些人。.....其他人。.....”，（some 和 others 都没有特指范围，即对他们范围和数量的都没有请去恶限定，也就是说都是泛指。当然others 也可与其他词配合，比如Many p

entry.tran: （表示在与已提及或已知的人或事物同一类中）别的，其他的，另外的，额外的
entry.def: You use other to refer to an additional thing or person of the same type as one that has been mentioned or is known about.

example.ex: They were just like any other young couple...
example.tran: 他们同别的年轻夫妇没什么两样。

example.ex: The communique gave no other details.
example.tran: 这份公报并未透露其他细节。

entry.tran: （表示与已提及的人或事物不同）别的，其他的
entry.def: You use other to indicate that a thing or person is not the one already mentioned, but a different one.

example.ex: The authorities insist that the discussions must not be linked to any other issue...
example.tran: 当局坚持此次讨论不得涉及其他任何问题。

example.ex: Calls cost 36p per minute cheap rate and 48p per minute at all other times...
example.tran: 话费在优惠时段为每分钟36便士，其他时段一律为每分钟48便士。

entry.def: You use the other to refer to the second of two things or people when the identity of the first is already known or understood, or has already been mentioned.

example.ex: The Captain was at the other end of the room...
example.tran: 船长在房间的另一头。

example.ex: You deliberately went in the other direction...
example.tran: 你故意朝另一个方向走。

entry.def: You use other at the end of a list or a group of examples, to refer generally to people or things like the ones just mentioned.

example.ex: Queensway Quay will incorporate shops, restaurants and other amenities...
example.tran: 女王道码头将会融商店、餐馆以及其他生活便利设施为一体。

example.ex: Place them in a jam jar, porcelain bowl, or other similar container.
example.tran: 将它们装入果酱罐、瓷碗或其他类似容器中。

entry.tran: （一组人或事物中）其余的，剩下的
entry.def: You use the other to refer to the rest of the people or things in a group, when you are talking about one particular person or thing.

example.ex: When the other pupils were taken to an exhibition, he was left behind.
example.tran: 当其余学生被带去参观展览时，他被留了下来。

entry.def: Other people are people in general, as opposed to yourself or a person you have already mentioned.

example.ex: The suffering of other people appals me...
example.tran: 人们的苦难让我无比震惊。

example.ex: She likes to be with other people.
example.tran: 她喜欢与人交往。

entry.def: You use other in informal expressions of time such as the other day ,the other evening, or the other week to refer to a day, evening, or week in the recent past.

example.ex: I rang her the other day and she said she'd like to come round...
example.tran: 我前几天给她打电话，她说想过来玩。

example.ex: The other evening we had a party.
example.tran: 前不久的某个晚上我们搞了一次聚会。

entry.tran: 除了别的以外；其中；包括
entry.def: You use expressions like among other things or among others to indicate that there are several more facts, things, or people like the one or ones mentioned, but that you do not intend to mention them all.

example.ex: He moved to England in 1980 where, among other things, he worked as a journalist...
example.tran: 他1980年移居英格兰，期间从事过包括记者在内的很多工作。

example.ex: His travels took him to Dublin, among other places...
example.tran: 他游历过很多地方，其中包括都柏林。

entry.def: If something happens, for example, every other day or every other month, there is a day or month when it does not happen between each day or month when it happens.

example.ex: Their food is adequate. It includes meat at least every other day, vegetables and fruit...
example.tran: 他们的伙食足够丰富了，有蔬菜、水果，而且至少每隔一天吃一次肉。

example.ex: Now that their children have grown up she joins Paddy in London every other week.
example.tran: 他们的孩子都长大了，她便每隔一周就到伦敦帕迪那里。

entry.tran: （用于强调，表示一组人或事物中）其余的，剩下的
entry.def: You use every other to emphasize that you are referring to all the rest of the people or things in a group.

example.ex: The same will apply in every other country.
example.tran: 这也适用于其他任何国家。

entry.def: You use none other than and no other than to emphasize the name of a person or thing when something about that person or thing is surprising in a particular situation.

example.ex: He called together all his employees and announced that the manager was none other than his son.
example.tran: 他把所有的员工召集到一起，宣布经理不是别人，正是他的儿子。

entry.def: You use nothing other than and no other than when you are going to mention a course of action, decision, or description and emphasize that it is the only one possible in the situation.

example.ex: Nothing other than an immediate custodial sentence could be justified...
example.tran: 只有判决即时监禁才算合理。

example.ex: The rebels would not be happy with anything other than the complete removal of the current regime...
example.tran: 叛乱分子只有彻底推翻了现政权才肯罢休。

entry.tran: （表示无法或不想确切说明）某一，某些
entry.def: You use or other in expressions like somehow or other and someone or other to indicate that you cannot or do not want to be more precise about the information that you are giving.

example.ex: I was going to have him called away from the house on some pretext or other...
example.tran: 我准备找个什么借口把他从屋里支出去。

example.ex: The Foundation is holding a dinner in honour of something or other...
example.tran: 基金会正举办某个纪念宴会。

entry.def: You use other than after a negative statement to say that the person, item, or thing that follows is the only exception to the statement.

example.ex: She makes no reference to any feminist work other than her own...
example.tran: 除了自己的之外，她没有提及其他女权主义著作。

example.ex: The journey by road to Wolverhampton is not recommended to anyone other than the most experienced cyclist.
example.tran: 除了经验非常丰富的自行车手外，建议其他人不要走去伍尔弗汉普顿的那条路。

auth_sentence.content: Others have knowingly passed on disabilities to their offspring.
auth_sentence.res_content: Others have knowingly passed on disabilities to their offspring.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Others have knowingly passed on disabilities to their offspring.

auth_sentence.content: Paine escaped to France but others were less fortunate.
auth_sentence.res_content: Paine escaped to France but others were less fortunate.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Paine escaped to France but others were less fortunate.

auth_sentence.content: The chap returned with two others in a car.
auth_sentence.res_content: The chap returned with two others in a car.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The chap returned with two others in a car.
